page.title: 14AVENUE CENTRE, HAMPTON WICK
page.content: The{Avenue Centre}in Normansfield Avenue, Hampton Wick, is a centre for mentally handicapped people. One hundred and thirty six students go to the centre from 9am to 4pm, Monday to Friday. The students are aged from sixteen to sixty five years old. Students are taught to do things that they need to be able to do at home like cooking, bathing and hair washing. The students do lots of activities in workshops. Some of the activities they do are pottery, rugmaking, candlemaking, carpentry, metalwork and woodwork. Once a week students and counsellors meet to discuss their activities and how they are getting on in the centre. Everybody who is there enjoys their day.
